COURSE_DESCRIPTION: Explores how emergency management practices and community interactions can help address social, economic and cultural inequities while building increased resilience.

INSTRUCTOR_NAME: Brown, Curtis;Chen, Michael;Montante, Christopher;Perez, Nicolas;Lee, Jenny
COURSE_DESCRIPTION: Examines the administrative functions of an emergency manager, including project management, policy implementation, acquisition of funding and managing diverse teams.

INSTRUCTOR_NAME: Mcgowan, Kevin;Chen, Michael;Montante, Christopher;Perez, Nicolas;Lee, Jenny
COURSE_DESCRIPTION: Explores how to manage and assess information to limit risk and make ethical, critical decisions under both steady-state and crisis situations.

INSTRUCTOR_NAME: Saruwatari, Mitch;Chen, Michael;Montante, Christopher;Perez, Nicolas;Lee, Jenny
COURSE_DESCRIPTION: Focuses on the complexity of post-disaster immediate and long-term response and recovery challenges in local, state, federal and international jurisdictions.

INSTRUCTOR_NAME: Finch, Christina;Chen, Michael;Montante, Christopher;Perez, Nicolas;Lee, Jenny
COURSE_DESCRIPTION: Creating inclusive and credible messages of risk across the disaster life cycle through a variety of methods.

COURSE_TITLE: Driving Successful Outcomes in Emergency Management
INSTRUCTOR_NAME: Ramaker, Jill;Chen, Michael;Montante, Christopher;Perez, Nicolas;Lee, Jenny
COURSE_DESCRIPTION: Explores how effective emergency management leaders develop trust, avoid ethical pitfalls, strengthen partnerships and integrate equity throughout the disaster life cycle.

COURSE_TITLE: Equity and Resilience in Emergency Management
INSTRUCTOR_NAME: Ramaker, Jill;Chen, Michael;Montante, Christopher;Perez, Nicolas;Lee, Jenny
COURSE_DESCRIPTION: Examines equity and resilience in emergency management as they pertain to areas such as planning, mitigation, disaster logistics and supply chains.

INSTRUCTOR_NAME: Danko, Tiffany;Chen, Michael;Montante, Christopher;Perez, Nicolas;Lee, Jenny
COURSE_DESCRIPTION: Demonstrate knowledge and skills developed throughout the emergency management program in an integrated way.
